name: Shotgun Shock
description:
Shotgun Shock is a 2D platformer where you cannot jump and have to use a cannon to move around, the shooting is hard to master but when you learn to do it right you can pull off some sweet jumps.

CONTROLS

A + D - Movement

S or R - Reload

W - Time Slow

Left Click - Shoot

CREDITS

Programming and Level Design - BlockedGiant

Programming and Art - Myself5000

Art and Cutscenes - VortexMaker Portfolio Youtube

KNOWN BUGS

The overall death counter in the options menu starts at 30 for some reason
